mapper.select: select mid, product, price, description, cafe_id, tag from menu;
select mid, product, price, description, tag from menu where cafe_id = #{cafe_id}
select cafe_id, product, price, description, tag from menu where mid = #{mid}
select mid, price, description, cafe_id, tag from menu where product like '%'+#{product}+'%';
mapper.insert: insert into ( product, price, description, cafe_id, tag ) values ( #{product}, #{price}, #{cafe_id}, #{tag}
mapper.update: update menu set product = #{product}, price = #{price}, description =#{description}, cafe_id = #{cafe_id}, tag =#{tag}, like_count =#{like_count}, tag =#{tag}, where mid=#{mid}
